code: 'use strict';function setAndForwardRef(_ref){var getForwardedRef=_ref.getForwardedRef,setLocalRef=_ref.setLocalRef;return function forwardRef(ref){var forwardedRef=getForwardedRef();setLocalRef(ref);if(typeof forwardedRef==='function'){forwardedRef(ref);}else if(typeof forwardedRef==='object'&&forwardedRef!=null){forwardedRef.current=ref;}};}export default setAndForwardRef;
